name: .ZWI File Extension
summary: Learn about .ZWI files and view a list of programs that open them.

instructions: You can open ZWI files with various wiki sites, such as HandWiki and Encyclosphere (developed by the Knowledge Standards Foundation). The open-source app DokuWiki can also open ZWI files.

Since ZWI files are Zip-compressed, you can open them with a zip-compression utility, such as Windows File Explorer, Apple Archive Utility (Mac), or Corel WinZip (Windows). You may need to rename the .zwi file extension to .zip for the decompression utility to recognize the format.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
